name: CafeSim
description:
Welcome to Cafe Sim!

This is just the beginning! More ingredients, machines, and customization are yet to come. Follow us on our social media to follow the evolution of the project. Customers will be arriving soon, research your surroundings and prepare your instruments! If you need help, review the notes left by the previous owner.

Good luck and thanks for playing!

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • ESC / P - Pause Menu
  • Left Click - Grab Item / Place Item
  • Right Click - Rotate Item
  • E - Interact
  • R - Return to Ratatouille

Look at an item for a few seconds to show more details of the Item. Either way, the controls display on the bottom right corner will help you.
